DOC.brief_summary: Low back pain ( LBP ) significant health problem affect 70 % -80 % population course life . The majority LBP resolve within 3 month ; however , 40 % LBP become chronic . One subgroup chronic LBP patient sciatica . Sciatica characterize radiate pain buttock low limb , without low back pain . It show upper limb position contra-lateral arm tension investigator actually reduce tension ipsilateral arm . Patients , present symptom like sciatica , benefit maneuver ( neural dynamic technique ) reduce tension contra-lateral leg . Working Hypothesis : Compared placebo maneuver upper limb , neural dynamic technique result good rehabilitation individual radicular LBP .
DOC.brief_title: Neural Dynamics Technique Treatment Chronic Radicular Low Back Pain
